result.title: HackerRank HourRank 14 Invitation
result.content:
Hello, Codeforces!

I want to invite all of you to participate in HourRank 14.

There will be four problems to solve in ONE hour. I am the author of all the problems in this contest and I hope you will enjoy solving them. Also, I would like to say thanks to dans and Shafaet for helping with contest preparation.

The top 10 will get awesome HackerRank t-shirts.

Editorials will be available at the end as usual.

Good Luck and Have Fun! :)

Score distribution is the following: 25-40-60-80

UPD: Unfortunately, contest will be unrated! :(

I am sorry for everything bad happened during the contest.
